text: The Ladon Lake ( Techniti Limni Ladona) or the Ladon Reservoir is an artificial lake in the upper part of the river Ladon, in the northwestern part of Arcadia, Greece. The 50 m high dam was built in 1955. The reservoir is situated in a sparsely populated, mountainous area. It is completely in the municipality Gortynia, municipal units Kleitor, Kontovazaina and Tropaia. ==See also== *List of lakes in Greece *List of reservoirs ==References== ==External links== *Ladon Lake on GTP Travel Pages (in English and Greek) Category:Landforms of Arcadia Category:Lakes of Greece Category:Reservoirs in Greece Category:Landforms of Peloponnese (region)
title: Ladon Lake
